# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your daily routine or professional capabilities. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm confident it will be a valuable addition to your life. I'm extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $200, which includes a limited-time discount compared to our standard retail price. Would you like to make this investment and experience the benefits firsthand? 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
